Overview.content_preview: The AgileAiAgents verbosity system controls how much detail AI agents display during their operations. This guide helps you configure verbosity to mat...

Quick Start.content_preview:
Set your verbosity level in `CLAUDE.md`:
```yaml
verbosity:
  level: "verbose"  # Choose: quiet, normal, verbose, debug
```

Location.content_preview: All verbosity settings are configured in the `CLAUDE.md` file at the root of your agile-ai-agents directory.

Full Configuration Options.content_preview:
```yaml

  level: "verbose"              # Output detail level
  display:
    format: "grouped_by_agent"  # How to group status messages
   ...
```
